static metadata are taken from following link:
https://sapui5.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/<VERSION>/test-resources/<LIBRARY>/designtime/codeassistance/Library.xmlmeta.json
Examples - sap.m and sap.ui.core libraries of ui5 version 1.38.33:
https://sapui5.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/1.38.33/test-resources/sap/m/designtime/codeassistance/Library.xmlmeta.json
https://sapui5.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/1.38.33/test-resources/sap/ui/core/designtime/codeassistance/Library.xmlmeta.json

Example for innovation (beta) version:
https://sapui5.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/1.54.2-beta/test-resources/sap/m/designtime/codeassistance/Library.xmlmeta.json
